access: Followers of Abraxas from Nex have access to this tattoo.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Open Mind](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1806)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 305

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Followers of Abraxas from Nex have access to this tattoo.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=71) teaches knowledge is the only power that matters. This tattoo of a stylized eye provides a +1 item bonus to [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** Abraxas opens your inner eye; you gain the effects of [_hypercognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=156).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
